OrgName.entry: TRADITIONAL OKINAWAN GOJU-RYU KARATE-DO (SHEFFIELD HALLAM DOJO)

Desc.entry: Okinawan goju ryu style of karate. Meeting venue is fully matted with changing room and toilet facilities. The Dojo is equipped with impact pads, makiwara and chi-ishi. Members of the International Okinawan Goju Ryu Karate Federation (IOGKF). Regular courses held with Chief Instructor Sensei G Andrews, 7th Dan. Participates in the European Gasshuku in July.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
